comments.body: nit: put a comment e.g. `/* paramName */` next to nil so it is clear what is being set to `nil`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +48,52 @@	allErrs = append(allErrs, apivalidation.ValidateEnv(spec.Env, fldPath.Child("env"))...)
	allErrs = append(allErrs, apivalidation.ValidateEnvFrom(spec.EnvFrom, fldPath.Child("envFrom"))...)
	allErrs = append(allErrs, apivalidation.ValidateVolumeMounts(spec.VolumeMounts, volumes, nil, fldPath.Child("volumeMounts"))...)

	return allErrs

comments.body: nit: For clarity, add a comment, e.g. `nil /* paramName */`, to indicate what parameter `nil` is being passed in for.

diffHunk:

	allErrs = append(allErrs, apivalidation.ValidateVolumeMounts(spec.VolumeMounts, volumes, nil, fldPath.Child("volumeMounts"))...)
